channel.title: Dumping
channel.description: how can i dump items anims gfxs and npc ids easy? im not good with clients... also how can i tell what is what in the dumped files? umm err i think i need pi client/code i know hybrid pvp v3 client works with my server

item.title: Dumping
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Roar337:

how can i dump items anims gfxs and npc ids easy? im not good with clients… also how can i tell what is what in the dumped files? umm err i think i need pi client/code i know hybrid pvp v3 client works with my server

Animations and GFX might be hard, however you can get the model ID that the GFX uses in its animation so that could possibly be some use to you. Most of the information in ‘dumped’ files is not very helpful to server development since most of the information contained in the ‘dumps’ has to do with model re-sizing, model placement, light vectors and what not. I suggest you create a HTML dump for say RSWiki, and then use that information.

Read full topic
